title: Mikel Landa Exits Giro d’Italia in Ambulance on Day One, Dashing GC Hopes
content:
The multi-time Giro stage winner was hit by bad luck on opening day as other GC hopefuls remained upright but lost time.

Read the full article at Mikel Landa Exits Giro d’Italia in Ambulance on Day One, Dashing GC Hopes on Velo.
